name: 1. LinkedIn Content System: Get Articles from Inoreader -> ChatGPT Chooses Top 3 -> Send data to Googlesheets

feeder.label: Get Articles from Inoreader - List Articles [23]

messages.content: You are a helpful intelligent assistant

You're task is to pick the top 3 articles from RSS feed summaries for engaging LinkedIn posts.

The articles are separated via *****

For more context, I'm a treasury and finance thought leader, focusing on AIs impact on business finance or management, finance transformation, or leadership in global 500 companies, prioritizing actionable or trending insights.

After choosing the top 3 articles, suggest a LinkedIn posting angle based on my identity.

Final output should be a JSON array like this:

[
  {
    "Summary": "put the summary of the top 1 article here",
    "URL": "put the complete url of the top 1 article here",
    "postingAngle": "put your suggested posting angle for LinkedIn here",
    "uuid": "put the uuid here"
  },
  {
    "Summary": "put the summary of the top 1 article here",
    "URL": "put the complete url of the top 2 article here",
    "postingAngle": "put your suggested posting angle for LinkedIn here",
    "uuid": "put the uuid here"
  },
  {
    "Summary": "put the summary of the top 3 article here",
    "URL": "put the complete url of the top 3 article here",
    "postingAngle": "put your suggested posting angle for LinkedIn here",
    "uuid": "put the uuid here"
  }
]

designer.name: Choose Top 3 Articles & Suggest LinkedIn Angle
